overview: The brothers Theo and Gustav Benthin pull profits through smuggling in divided Germany: Theo in the West and Gustav in the East. The East German police catch on quickly, however, and Gustav is arrested. The small band of smugglers disperses, with Gustavâ€™s chauffer Peter Naumann fleeing to the West and his sister choosing the East after struggling to find work and lodging in the West.
title: The Benthin Family
